itemDescription: English journalist and editor of Asian News

wikipedia_page.main: Shelina Begum (Bengali: শেলিনা বেগম; born 27 December 1979) is an English journalist, former editor of Asian News and former business editor at the Manchester Evening News.

response: * Shelina Begum – Journalist and editor of Asian News. In 2006, she was named North West Journalist of the Year at the British Nuclear Fuels-sponsored press wards.
